sheet.name: en
sheet.text: There were underground passages on Ares Island. I wonder if the Ancients were building something down there?
Tens of thousands of years ago, a fleet of spaceships carrying the Ancients landed on this planet. Several of those ships are now deep underwater, unable to fly, but their power is still active.
Still active? From tens of thousands of years ago?

They used their spaceship's power to build a new civilization on this island. The underground passages on Ares Island were one of many paths leading to the submerged spaceships, though they no longer seem to be connected.
